column17: The incident occurred in the town of Mlzay.
column18: 11/05/2007: Militants using firearms from the Democratic Movement for the Liberation of the Eritrean Kunamas (DMLEK) attacked government soldiers, killing or wounding fifteen of them in Mlzay, Eritrea.
column58: Democratic Movement for the Liberation of the Eritrean Kunamas (DMLEK)
column108: It is unknown if any property was damaged in this attack.
column125: The militants also took weapons, ammunition, and medical equipment from the soldiers.

column18: 11/05/2007: The Democratic Movement for the Liberation of the Eritrean Kunamas (DMLEK) destroyed the office of the Shembeko town administration with an RPG in Western Eritrea. No casualties were reported.
column58: Democratic Movement for the Liberation of the Eritrean Kunamas (DMLEK)
column108: The offices were destroyed and other equipment was destroyed in the offices.
column132: 06/01/2008: On Sunday, four Eritrean soldiers, including a senior commander, were killed and more than 10 others wounded when Red Sea Afars Democratic Organization members attacked them in Morad, Eritrea.
column178: The specific motive for the attack is unknown.
column211: Unknown weapons were used in the attack.
